text: Wind Across the Everglades is a 1958 movie directed by Nicholas Ray. ==Cast== *Burl Ives as Cottonmouth *Christopher Plummer as Walt Murdock *Gypsy Rose Lee as Mrs. Bradford *George Voskovec as Aaron Nathanson *Tony Galento as Beef *Howard I. Smith as George Liggett *Emmett Kelly as Bigamy Bob *Pat Henning as Sawdust *Chana Eden as Naomi Nathanson *Curt Conway as Perfessor *Peter Falk as Writer *Fred Grossinger as Slowboy *Sammy Renick as Loser *Toch Brown as One-note *Frank Rothe as Howard Ross Morgan *MacKinlay Kantor as Judge Harris *Cory Osceola as Billy One-Arm ==References== Category:1958 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Ray Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set in the 1900s
title: Wind Across the Everglades
